entry.title: ARCTIC OUTFLOW WARNING , Bella Coola
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:41 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.1°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 early this evening then becoming light late this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
